EmailTemplate.name: 202005_Global_CPS_Cosmos-Move_Email_Operational.Coon Rapids - Feb 2021 Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Coon Rapids to Clearwater Transition Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Clearwater has received the Air Agency Certificate reflecting the change in location (from 8840 Evergreen Blvd Coon Rapids, MN to 13051 66th Street Plant 4 Largo, Florida), Effective 2/1/2021
Honeywell International has received the Air Agency Certificate reflecting the change in location (from 8840 Evergreen Blvd Coon Rapids, MN to 13051 66th Street Plant 4 Largo, Florida), Effective 2/1/2021
The attached are the Honeywell / Largo, FL FAA Repair Documents and approvals.
- Air Agency Certificate - Operations Specifications - Work Away Authorization for the Coon Rapids facility on a short-term basis
Feb 1st, 2021, the FAA / EASA 8130-3 Duel release tags will reflect:
Honeywell International Inc 13051 66th Street Plant 4 Largo, FL 33773
No change to repair station certification numbers:
- FAA Cert # KE2R949K or EASA Cert # EASA.145.4538 - Request for change in location for the CAAC MOC (Chinese Certificate F00100463) has been submitted and we expect to receive update in the coming days. We do not expect the CAAC cert number to change.
The Coon Rapids, MN Facility has been authorized as a Work Away Station of the Largo, FL home station on a short-term basis as the transition completes. Work away expected to end 3/31/2021.
